_header: When that young man I was
Subjects: Julian the apostate, emperor, life of; Julian, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Lives of four St. Julians and Julian the Apostate, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
qwene þat ȝunge mane I wasI trawalyt oft in sere
                    place…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& syne in hewine herbryt beAmen Amen
                    parcheryte
